ops.js:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:2}); // {Cloud}
“Something fell out of the sky
and crashed down here…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:3}); // {Cloud}
“Leaving a scar on the Planet.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:4}); // {Cloud}
“Sephiroth took that energy and
is trying to use Meteor.”{PAUSE}“Next time
the wound won't be so small.”

ops.raw: d0 cc fd df fe 2d fb cc fd 90 fe 37 fb

ops.mr: Execute script #%3 in extern group %1 (priority %2/6) - Only if the script is not already running|_script(groupID)|priority|scriptID

ops.js:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:5}); // {Barret}
“So all this energy's gathered here
for the Planet to heal itself?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:6}); // {Tifa}
“So the Planet has gathered all
this energy here to heal itself?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:7}); // {Red XIII}
“The energy of the Planet is
concentrated here.”{PAUSE}“It is slowly healing
its old wound.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:9}); // {Cid}
“Damn, this's somethin'.
It's gathered all that energy
to try an' heal itself.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:8}); // {Yuffie}
“Even I know what's going on.
The energy's bein' gathered here
to heal the gash.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:10}); // {Cait Sith}
“It's trying to heal its wound
by gathering all that energy here.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:11}); // {Vincent}
“It's amassed a vast amount of energy
to heal itself.”

dialogStrings:
{Cloud}
“Something fell out of the sky
and crashed down here…”

{Cloud}
“Sephiroth took that energy and
is trying to use Meteor.”{PAUSE}“Next time
the wound won't be so small.”

{Barret}
“So all this energy's gathered here
for the Planet to heal itself?”

{Tifa}
“So the Planet has gathered all
this energy here to heal itself?”

{Red XIII}
“The energy of the Planet is
concentrated here.”{PAUSE}“It is slowly healing
its old wound.”

{Yuffie}
“Even I know what's going on.
The energy's bein' gathered here
to heal the gash.”

{Cid}
“Damn, this's somethin'.
It's gathered all that energy
to try an' heal itself.”

{Cait Sith}
“It's trying to heal its wound
by gathering all that energy here.”

{Vincent}
“It's amassed a vast amount of energy
to heal itself.”
